feed.title: Blog example
feed.subtitle: This is an example of a Lume blog theme

entry.title: How to install this theme
entry.content: Simple blog is a clean and minimal blog theme for Lume, with support for tags and authors. It allows to build your own blog in seconds, providing also support for RSS.

entry.title: This is my second post
entry.content: Leverage agile frameworks to provide a robust synopsis for high level overviews. Iterative approaches to corporate strategy foster collaborative thinking to further the overall value proposition. Organically grow the holistic world view of disruptive innovation via workplace diversity and empowerment.
